SELECT BANNER_SN , LINK_URL , IMAGE_NM , SUBSTR(IMAGE_NM, 1, 15) IMAGE_NM_SHORT , IMAGE_PATH , IMAGE_SIZE , SORT_ORDR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BEGIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DE , '/file/getGoodsHitImage/'||CHR(63)||'banner_sn='||BANNER_SN AS IMAGE_URL , USE_AT , CASE WHEN BEGIN_DE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= END_DE THEN 'A' WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < BEGIN_DE THEN 'B' WHEN END_DE < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'C' ELSE 'X' END AS CF_ING , REGIST_ID , REGIST_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT FROM TB_GOODS_HIT WHERE 1 = 1
AND USE_AT = #USE_AT#
ORDER BY USE_AT DESC, CF_ING, SORT_ORDR

SELECT BANNER_SN , LINK_URL , IMAGE_NM , IMAGE_PATH , IMAGE_SIZE , SORT_ORDR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BEGIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DE , USE_AT , REGIST_ID , REGIST_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT FROM TB_GOODS_HIT WHERE BANNER_SN = #banner_sn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS_HIT SET SORT_ORDR = #SORT_ORDR# , LINK_URL = #LINK_URL# , BEGIN_DE = REPLACE(#BEGIN_DE#, '-', '') , END_DE = REPLACE(#END_DE#, '-', '') , USE_AT = #USE_AT# , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE BANNER_SN = #BANNER_SN#
